question:
You have lost an item of value on a train. 


Write a letter to the railway company. In your letter


describe the item
explain where and when you left it
say what action you would like the company to take
Write at least 150 words.
text: My name is Naomi Umami. I am writing this letter regarding the loss of my Apple Watch during my trip from the Robson station to the Evergreen Station last Thursday, 3rd March 2022.

I got on the train from the Robson station at 7:00 in the morning, and I was on the first car on the train.  I put my Apple Watch on the seat by the window in order to put some sunscreen on my arm.  I completely forgot to put it back on my arm.

My Apple Watch has a black surface and the colour of the band is pink.  I would really appreciate it if you could check and see if there is such an object in your Lost and Found section. Please do not hesitate to contact me for any further information about my loss.
I thank you in advance for your help and cooperation.I look forward to hearing from you at your earliest convenience.
